judul.teks1: The VLT® Micro Drive FC-51 is a general-purpose frequency converter that can control AC motors up to 22.0 kW. It is a compact and reliable drive designed for industrial, HVAC, and OEM applications — delivering high performance, easy setup, and strong environmental compliance.
judul.list3: Built-in RFI filter and brake chopper (≥ 1.5 kW) Automatic Motor Tuning for optimal performance 98% efficiency and energy-saving mode (AEO) Flying start and Smart Logic Controller for flexibility Coated PCB for protection in harsh environments RoHS compliant, environmentally friendly design
judul.list4: 🛠️ Industrial machines 💨 Fans & pumps ❄️ HVAC systems 🧩 OEM integration

judul.teks1: The VLT® Midi Drive FC-280 delivers efficient and flexible motor control for pumps, fans, conveyors, and mixers. Built to simplify installation and operation, it ensures energy efficiency, safety, and easy integration.
judul.list3: Integrated DC choke and RFI filter for harmonics reduction Dual-channel Safe Torque Off (STO) for safety Pluggable terminals for quick installation Memory module for easy parameter transfer Built-in brake chopper and USB connectivity PM & induction motor compatible

judul.teks1: The VLT® HVAC Drive FC-102 is optimized for building automation and air-handling systems. It ensures energy savings, quiet operation, and advanced motor control for HVAC applications.
judul.list3: Automatic Energy Optimization (AEO) Built-in PID control for flow and pressure regulation BACnet, Modbus, and LonWorks communication Fire mode operation for emergency ventilation Real-time clock & smart scheduling
judul.list4: 🏢 HVAC systems 🌬️ Air handling units ❄️ Chillers & cooling towers

judul.teks1: The VLT® AQUA Drive FC-202 is specifically designed for water and wastewater systems. It ensures smooth pump control, energy efficiency, and system protection.
judul.list3: Integrated PID control for pressure/flow stability Dry pump detection & automatic cleaning Energy-saving algorithms for variable flow Low harmonic emission with DC choke User-friendly display with setup wizard
judul.list4: 🚰 Water supply 🏭 Wastewater plants 💧 Irrigation systems

judul.teks1: The VLT® Automation Drive FC-302 is a high-performance drive for industrial automation and process control. Built for durability, flexibility, and precision in demanding environments.
judul.list3: Smart Logic Control and PLC functions Modular design for easy upgrades Category 3 Safety Terminal for machine protection Ambient temperature up to 50°C without derating Compatible with all major fieldbus systems

judul.teks1: The VACON® 20 is a compact and cost-efficient AC drive for simple automation tasks. It offers fast installation, flexible programming, and reliable performance.
judul.list3: Built-in PLC functionality Easy parameter copying via memory stick DIN rail mounting for space-saving setup Multiple I/O and fieldbus options
judul.list4: ⚙️ OEM machinery 🚧 Conveyors 🌀 Small pumps & fans

judul.teks1: The VACON® 100 FLOW is a dedicated drive for pump and fan control. It provides energy-efficient flow management and advanced process control.
judul.list3: Flow calculation and PID control Sleep function for low-load conditions Built-in pump clean and multi-pump control Ethernet, Modbus, Profibus communication

judul.teks1: The VACON® 100 INDUSTRIAL is a versatile drive for industrial motor control. It combines robust performance with flexible connectivity and safety functions.
judul.list3: Integrated PLC and communication options Long lifetime components Advanced diagnostics & condition monitoring Safe Torque Off (STO) function
judul.list4: 🏭 Process industries ⚙️ Heavy machinery 📦 Manufacturing lines

judul.teks1: The IC2-Micro is a simple and compact inverter for basic motor control applications. Delivers stable operation, easy setup, and energy efficiency in small systems.
judul.list3: Compact size with easy wiring User-friendly keypad Cost-effective solution for standard drives

judul.teks1: The VACON® NXP Air Cooled is a premium performance drive for demanding industrial and marine applications. It provides precise motor control, high reliability, and modular air-cooled design.
judul.list3: High dynamic control for all motor types Flexible I/O and communication Modular air cooling for easy maintenance Built for 24/7 continuous operation
judul.list4: ⚙️ Metal processing 🚢 Marine 🏭 Pulp & paper industries

judul.teks1: The VLT® OneGearDrive combines a permanent magnet motor and optimized gearbox for maximum efficiency. Ideal for conveyor and material handling systems.
judul.list3: IE5 ultra-premium efficiency Hygienic design for food & beverage industry Fewer variants simplify spare parts and service Low noise and maintenance-free

judul.teks1: The MCD 100 is an extremely cost-effective and compact soft starter for basic motor start/stop applications.
judul.list3: DIN-rail mounting Very basic smooth start/stop Universal control voltage (24-480 V AC/DC)

judul.teks1: The MCD 202 series is a compact but powerful soft starter offering motor-protection features and suited for motors up to ~110 kW.
judul.list3: 2-wire or 3-wire start/stop control Built-in bypass Compact size Good for higher duty starts

judul.teks1: The MCD 600 is the advanced soft-starter series from Danfoss, combining smart control, communications and protection—optimized for demanding fixed-speed applications.
judul.list2: Varies; supports large motors (e.g., 410 A version noted)
judul.list3: EtherNet/IP, Modbus, Profibus options Adaptive start/stop profiles Motor thermistor input & logging Remote keypad option
judul.list4: 🏭 Heavy duty motors 🏗️ Industrial plants ⚙️ Large conveyors

judul.teks1: The VLT® Sine-Wave Filter MCC 101 is an output filter installed between the drive and the motor to create a near-sinusoidal phase-to-phase voltage. It helps reduce voltage spikes, bearing currents, and motor noise, ensuring smoother and longer motor operation.
judul.list3: Converts drive output into a pure sine-wave Reduces motor insulation stress and bearing currents Allows side-by-side installation with the drive for higher ratings
judul.list4: ⚙️ High-voltage motors 🔌 Long cable runs 🏭 Industrial applications requiring high reliability

judul.teks1: The VLT® dU/dt Filter MCC 102 is a low-pass filter that reduces the rate of voltage change (dU/dt) at the motor terminals. It is ideal for installations with long motor cables or harsh environments, protecting motors from voltage peaks and insulation wear.
judul.list2: 3 × 200–690 V, up to ~880 A (depending on variant)
judul.list3: Reduces voltage spikes and motor insulation stress Low reactance, suitable for dynamic applications and vector control Extends motor lifetime and minimizes electrical interference
judul.list4: 🔌 Long cable motor runs ⚙️ Frequent start/stop systems 🏗️ Heavy-duty industrial setups

judul.teks1: The VLT® Brake Resistor MCE 101 absorbs regenerative energy generated during motor deceleration or braking. It protects electrical components from overheating and ensures safe and stable braking performance.
judul.list2: Matched to drive size — compatible with all VLT® FC Series drives
judul.list3: Designed specifically for VLT® FC drives Available in horizontal and vertical mounting options Rugged construction with efficient heat dissipation
judul.list4: 🏗️ Elevators 🚚 Conveyors ⚙️ Applications with frequent braking 🧱 Drive braking systems

judul.teks1: The VLT® Common Mode Filter MCC 105 uses nanocrystalline magnetic cores to reduce high-frequency common-mode currents. It prevents bearing damage and minimizes electromagnetic interference (EMC) in sensitive systems.
judul.list2: Compatible with all VLT® drive power ranges — from 0.18 kW up to 1.4 MW
judul.list3: High-performance nanocrystalline core material Oval-shaped design fits tight retrofit spaces Reduces EMI and improves overall system reliability
judul.list4: ⚙️ EMC-sensitive installations 🧰 Motors with bearing current issues 🏭 Precision industrial systems

judul.teks1: The VLT® Line Reactor MCC 103 is an input-side reactor used to reduce harmonics and inrush currents in drive systems. It improves power quality and system stability, especially when multiple drives share a DC-link.
judul.list2: Example unit: 380–500 V, 32 A (various ratings available)
judul.list3: Reduces harmonic distortion and input current peaks Improves system stability and power balance Supports load sharing between drives
judul.list4: 🏭 Multi-drive systems ⚡ DC-link sharing 🔋 Large industrial installations
